title: Quantity Queries for CSS
description: In responsive design, we think a lot about space, especially in the context of screen sizes. But the amount of content or the number of elements is bound to affect space, too, just as unpredictablyâ€¦
author: Heydon Pickering

title: :nth-last-child()
description: The :nth-last-child() CSS pseudo-class matches elements based on their position among a group of siblings, counting from the end.
